name: Lethal Alchemist
description:
In "Lethal Alchemist" you play as Lenny Lethal, a notorious poison mixer who is proficient in crafting all the right poisons for every occasion.

Complete contracts by mixing ingredients into powerful poisons with various effects.

Send your assistant to collect more ingredients from different locations.

Learn everything about the ingredients by combining them.

This game as well as most of the assets were made in 3 days for the 129th mini jam with the theme "Poison" hosted by ZahranW and KingW.

Disclaimer:
Not all planned mechanics were implemented by the time of release of version 1.0. There might be some bugs and balancing issues when it comes to certain aspects.
